item.title: Road pavement completely damaged harsh surfaces that can cause several issues in cars suspension., 30th January
item.description:
The pavement of the end of the street is in very bad shape and is very hard when you drive there. Pavement has several misalignments all over and several padholdes. There are schools nearby this road if you need to stop in an emergency situation car will not stop due to raod conditions. This needs to be addressed ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Normanhurst Avenue, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 deep potholes. Each one is over 12” long, 30th January
item.description:
As you can see from the photos, previous repairs have failed. Vehicles are swerving as they attempt to avoid damaging their vehicle. I saw 2 kids this afternoon almost hit as they were crossing on the bridge. What 3 words : lease.export.brings. BEXLEY BOROUGH

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crossway, Thamesmead, Greater London

item.title: Dangerous road with massive padholdes almost had a car accident, 30th January
item.description:

item.title: 17 Brixham road is full of pathholes which is prone to car accidents and create issues in car suspension that can cause accidents and put drivers at danger and also pedestrians., 30th January
item.description:
17 brixham road is in a very poor status and entire street pavement should be replaced. If you drive there with your own car you will understand better the issue. Massive padhold and road is misaligned everywhere.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brixham Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
